A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An fairly decent Star Wars film\, with twists and turns and fantastic new creatures. But with an ending that left me stabbed through my fandom heart like Han’s betrayal in Episode 7. The whole film builds to this triumphant moment of Luke where we all cheered\, only to have it mercilessly ripped away from us as he meets a pointless and unceremonious end. I think Disney owes us all an apology for the most disrespectful way in which they handled the end of Luke Skywalker. I will not be buying advance tickets to anymore Star Wars films because of the how this ended. Shame on Disney for this betrayal of the fandom and their disrespect of one of the most beloved characters in human fictional history.
